pullRequest.title: Add BINList Support
pullRequest.bodyText:
sharedutils > Add classes and functionality to load BINList and retrieve entries. This leverages a compressible collection structure from Apache commons collections (PatriciaTrie).
pscanrulesBeta > Change PiiScanner to leverage the new functionality and lookup evidence against the BINList. If a match is found raise at High confidence and with additional details included in otherinfo, otherwise Medium confidence.
pscanrules > Change InformationDisclosureReferrerScanner to leverage the new functionality and lookup evidence against the BINList. If a match is found raise at High confidence and with additional details included in otherinfo, otherwise Medium confidence.

Fixes zaproxy/zaproxy#5842
Signed-off-by: kingthorin kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com

beforeCommit.message:
Add BINList Support

- sharedutils > Add classes and functionality to load BINList and
retrieve entries. This leverages a compressible collection structure
from Apache commons collections (PatriciaTrie).
- pscanrulesBeta > Change PiiScanner to leverage the new functionality
and lookup evidence against the BINList. If a match is found raise at
High confidence and with additional details included in otherinfo,
otherwise Medium confidence.
- pscanrules > Change InformationDisclosureReferrerScanner to leverage
the new functionality and lookup evidence against the BINList. If a
match is found raise at Medium confidence and with additional details
included in otherinfo, otherwise Low confidence.

Fixes zaproxy/zaproxy#5842

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>

nodes.bodyText: I guess this method isn't really needed. I had created it while building/testing. But then ended up doing something similar in the individual scan packages so that the field names would be local and translated (once CrowdIn is back in action).
